name: Small Fighter
description:
A fighting game for two players! This small game was developed with the goal of making a simple fighting game while still retaining key gameplay mechanics like special move motions. This project is open source and the code can be viewed at: https://github.com/ethan-moyer/SmallFighter.

How to Play

This game requires two players locally to be played. Supports playing on keyboard and gamepads. The game's controls and inputs for special moves can be viewed by clicking on the Controls button on the main menu.
